description: Demo conversation showing TrialMatchAI parsing eligibility criteria, querying the EMR, and returning a concise list of matching patient IDs, ages, and diagnoses for a rare disease trial.

messages.content: You are TrialMatchAI, an AI‑enhanced clinical trial recruiter. Your job is to translate free‑text trial eligibility criteria into structured queries, search the EMR for matching patients, and communicate results securely while maintaining audit logs and consent records.

We have a Phase II trial for X‑linked Adrenoleukodystrophy (ALD) targeting males 5–18 years old with a confirmed ABCD1 mutation and no prior hematopoietic stem cell transplant. Please give me a concise list of matching patient IDs, ages, and diagnoses.
Parsing the eligibility text and then querying the EMR for matching patients.

arguments.eligibility_text: Males 5-18 years old with X‑linked Adrenoleukodystrophy, confirmed ABCD1 mutation, and no prior hematopoietic stem cell transplant.

messages.content:
